Project information

  • Category: Mobile App Design
  • Client: AceMinton
  • Project date: 01 March, 2023

AMC - An Online Badminton Court Reservation Mobile Application

In a hustle-bustle city lifestyle, where the time preservation is of the essence, the necessity for convenient and efficient services is of paramount importance, particularly on the badminton court reservation process which its essence is originally for recreation and effortless. An Online Badminton Court Reservation System is proposed to address the rising needs for effective court reservations by badminton enthusiasts and it will be developed and named as AceMinton Connection, also known as AMC, a novel mobile application system.
